tha-ap397:6.2: araññe → vipine (bj) | irine (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | iriṇe (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap397:16.4: gāthā pabyāharī → gāthā'mā vyāharī (bj) | gāthā sabyāharī (sya1ed, sya2ed) | gāthā mavyāhārī (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap397:19.3: mahantassa → brahaṃ tassa (bj) | brahantassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap397:26.1: caratā → caraṇā (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | carite (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap397:30.1: Idha passāmi → idhaddasāsiṃ (bj) | tamaddasāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | tamaddassāsiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
